headline: Business-to-Business (B2B) Continuing Education Report 2026: A $10+ Billion Market by 2030, Driven by Rising Demand for Online Learning, AI Personalization, and Reskilling Programs - Forecast to 2035
summary: Opportunities in the B2B continuing education market include rising demand for online learning, AI-driven personalization, and reskilling programs, with growing integrations in enterprise systems. Key regions are North America and Asia-Pacific, focusing on cloud computing and AI skills training, led by companies like Microsoft and Adobe.
